attributes.action: Guarantee the right to correspond with the government via non electronic means.
attributes.background: It is my fear there will become a time when using a computer will be the only means to communicate with our Government. Men, women & business should  always be able to contact & submit payments or taxes via pen and paper free from incurring extra cost for doing so.

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
